snippet.title: R.B.I. Baseball '14 review: Nah
snippet.description:
R.B.I. Baseball '14 review: Nah by Grant Brisbee on Apr 10 2014, 12:31p
The new R.B.I. Baseball is here, and it tries to appeal to both old and new fans. That's a problem.

snippet.title: Flying the world's fastest plane: Behind the stick of the SR-71
snippet.description:
Flying the world's fastest plane: Behind the stick of the SR-71 by Spencer Hall on Mar 7 2014, 1:30p
Spencer Hall interviews former SR-71 Blackbird pilot Rick McCrary about what it's like to fly the world's fastest plane. Spoiler: It's terrifying.

snippet.title: Hunter's World: A Day with PGA Tour Star Hunter Mahan
snippet.description:
Hunter's World: A Day with PGA Tour Star Hunter Mahan by Brendan Porath on Dec 10 2013, 3:17p
Hunter Mahan respects and embraces the responsibilities that come along with being in the limelight. We spent the day with the five-time PGA Tour champion at Under Armour Headquarters and famed...

snippet.title: NCAA Tournament 2013: Best and worst of Sunday's madness
snippet.description:
NCAA Tournament 2013: Best and worst of Sunday's madness by Mike Rutherford on Mar 25 2013, 9:11a
With a pair of buzzer-beaters and two "teen seeds" advancing to the Sweet 16, the final act of the NCAA Tournament's opening weekend certainly did not disappoint.

snippet.title: Rip It Like Rickie: Cobra Golf Launches AMP Driver In Fowler’s Favorite Color
snippet.description:
